entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
